title: Random Element in List | Challenge
description: In Python, you can easily get a random element from a list using the random module. This module provides a function called choice() which returns a random element from a given list. In this challenge, you will be asked to write a function that takes a list as an argument and returns a random element from that list.

meta.title: Random Element in List Python Challenge
meta.description: Learn how to get a random element from a list in Python using the random module.

verify.name: Verify Python 3 Script Execution in Temporary Directory
verify.hint: Please make sure you have completed the required actions.

i18n.title: 列表中的随机元素 | 挑战
i18n.description: 在Python中，你可以使用random模块轻松地从列表中获取一个随机元素。该模块提供了一个名为choice()的函数，它从给定列表中返回一个随机元素。在这个挑战中，你将被要求编写一个函数，该函数接受一个列表作为参数，并从该列表中返回一个随机元素。

meta.title: Python列表随机元素挑战
meta.description: 学习如何使用random模块在Python中从列表获取随机元素。
meta.keywords: choice, Python, 列表, 随机, 编程
